description: This file contains Pydantic schema definitions for catalog entities such as artists, albums, tracks, and search parameters in a music streaming service project.

classes.name: ArtistBase
classes.description: Base schema for artist entity, including name and optional biography.

classes.name: ArtistCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating a new artist, extending ArtistBase.

classes.name: ArtistOut
classes.description: Schema for outputting artist data, including id and timestamps, with configuration to use attributes.

classes.name: AlbumBase
classes.description: Base schema for album entity, including title, artist id, release year, and cover image.

classes.name: AlbumCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating a new album, extending AlbumBase.

classes.name: AlbumOut
classes.description: Schema for outputting album data, including id and timestamps, with configuration to use attributes.

classes.name: TrackBase
classes.description: Base schema for track entity, including title, artist id, optional album id, genre, duration, and audio URL.

classes.name: TrackCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating a new track, extending TrackBase.

classes.name: TrackOut
classes.description: Schema for outputting track data, including id and timestamps, with configuration to use attributes.

classes.name: CatalogSearchParams
classes.description: Schema for search parameters including query, genre, artist, and album filters.
